title: Tomb Raider Game of The Year Edition-PROPHET
description:
Tomb Raider: Game of the Year Edition (c) SQUARE ENIX

release date ...: February 2767
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/CZ/PT-BR/NL/
CN/KR/AR

-----------------------------------------------------

Tomb Raider explores the intense and gritty  origin
story of Lara Croft and her  ascent  from  a  young
woman to a hardened survivor. Armed only  with  raw
instincts and the ability to push beyond the limits
of human endurance, Lara must fight to unravel  the
dark history of a forgotten island  to  escape  its
relentless hold. Download the Turning Point trailer
to see the beginning of Lara's epic adventure.

The official GOTY Edition includes:

* Scavenger Scout DLC
* Shanty Town DLC
* Scavenger Executioner DLC
* Scavenger Bandit DLC
* Fisherman DLC
* Silverballer DLC
* Agency SPS 12 DLC
* HX AP-15 DLC
* JAGD P22G DLC
* M590 12ga DLC
* STG 58 Elite DLC
* Animal Instinct DLC
* Agility Skill DLC
* Headshot Reticule DLC
* Pistol Burst DLC
* Pistol Silencer DLC
* Hunter Skin DLC
* Aviatrix Skin DLC
* Guerilla Skin DLC
* Mountaineer Skin DLC
* Caves and Cliffs Multiplayer Map Pack DLC
* Tomb of the Lost Adventurer DLC
* Shipwrecked Multiplayer Map Pack DLC
* 1939 Multiplayer Map Pack DLC
* Demolition Skin DLC
* Sure-Shot Skin DLC
* Zack Levi (Hidden DLC)

The Survival Edition content is also included!

-----------------------------------------------------

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
Game version is 1.01.748.0. If game  doesn't  start
in language selected during the installation launch
the game and from main menu go to Options->Gameplay
and select your language there.
